William Davis
=============

[City Council](https://www.eaglepasstx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=25)
Title: Council Place 1

Mayor Pro-Tem William W. “Billy” Davis is the senior member of Council who has served over 10 years.   Mr. Davis was an Educator for the Eagle Pass Independent School District for ten years before leaving the district to manage his family business.  He has been an active member of the business community specifically with serving as President of the Eagle Pass Chamber of Commerce for 17 years and remains an active member of said Board of Directors.  Mr. Davis has also served on the Middle Rio Grande Workforce Solutions Board, President of the Eagle Pass Rotary Club, Vice President of the Arts Council of Eagle Pass, board member of the Maverick County Development Corporation, President of the Kennedy Hall PTO and President of the Graves Elementary PTO for several years. He currently serves on the MRGDC Board of Directors, Fort Duncan Regional Medical Center Board of Governors, Chairman of the Maverick County Appraisal District and 1
Vice President of the Eagle Pass Chamber of Commerce.

Mr. Davis received completed his undergraduate studies at the University of the Incarnate Word where he earned a Bachelor of Business Administration with concentration in Finance. While at UIW, Mr. Davis was on the Dean’s List and President of the International Business Society. He completed his Master’s Degree in Business Administration at Sul Ross University-Rio Grande College and his Masters of Science in Educational Administration at Texas A&M International University. Mr. Davis is a member of Phi Kappa Phi Honor Society.  He graduated Summa Cum Laude from Texas A&M International with a 4.0 GPA.
